Topic : International prophecy teacher, television and radio host, and author, Irvin Baxter, spends the hour with Rick and Chris to discuss the prophetic implications of the current geopolitical environment. Topics covered include, the 7 trumpets mentioned in Revelation, the identity of Mystery Babylon, trigger points and participants of the end-time wars, and the near-term prospect of a peace agreement being signed between Israel and Palestine.
